definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.
sentences.chinese: 軸承允許傳動軸轉動的同時允許殼體保持靜止。

sentences.english: Going into the gearbox, universal joints connect the centre drive shaft to the internal bevel gears.
sentences.chinese: 進入變速箱，萬向節連接中心傳動軸到內部錐齒輪。

sentences.english: Double joint added to the front drive shaft and the shaft made longer.
sentences.chinese: 改裝內容包括雙十字軸和加長前傳動軸。

sentences.english: The material dialing disc can drive around the drive shaft.
sentences.chinese: 撥料盤可繞傳動軸傳動。

sentences.english: Improved design of the old instrument shaft, made success through one trial-manufacture.
sentences.chinese: 改進了儀表傳動軸原設計，一次試製成功。

sentences.english: The ECS drive shaft equalizes the speed between the drive shaft and the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 精英傳動軸均衡的速度之間的傳動軸和車輪。

sentences.english: The ECS drive shaft equalizes the speed between the drive shaft and the wheel.
sentences.chinese: 精英傳動軸均衡的速度之間的傳動軸和車輪。

sentences.english: The propeller shaft is a drive shaft to carry the power from the transmission to the rear-wheel axles.
sentences.chinese: 傳動軸是將動力從變速器傳送到後橋的驅動軸上。

sentences.english: Abnormal noise often occurs in motor vehicle transmission system especially in propeller shaft and final reduction gear.
sentences.chinese: 汽車傳動系特別是傳動軸與主減速器常產生異常響聲。

sentences.english: Disclosed is a grate cooler drive shaft device.
A lubricating oil pump shaft and a cam transmission shaft are respectively sheathed in series in two inner cavities.
sentences.chinese: 兩內腔內分別串套機油泵軸和凸輪傳動軸。

sentences.english: Wanxiang sells joint bearings, Midea sells electric fans, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 萬向銷售傳動軸承，美的銷售電風扇，等等。

sentences.english: The rotor is mounted on the drive shaft of the automobile via the flange plate of the rotor.
sentences.chinese: 所述轉子通過轉子法蘭盤安裝在汽車傳動軸上。

sentences.english: The reel is supported by expansion shaft is unwinded by a motorized wheel.
sentences.chinese: 該卷盤被擴張傳動軸所支持，通過一個動力輪被展開。

sentences.english: The design of drive shaft is rational in mill system of single - pinion drives.
sentences.chinese: 邊緣傳動式磨機系統的傳動軸的設計是合理的。
